summary: WHO IS GRUMPY CAT? - In the quirky land of Memeville, Grumpy Cat was the queen of scowls. While the town prepared for the annual Happiness Festival, Grumpy Cat remained unimpressed. During the festivities, everyone tried to cheer her up, but nothing worked. Then, a clumsy baby sloth tripped and spilled glitter all over Grumpy Cat, making her look even more disgruntled. Despite her efforts to stay grumpy, her sparkling frown became the festival's highlight, secretly pleasing her for bringing joy to Memeville.
